Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will serve you well. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible deal while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
